history.text: Hi

Hi! 
We are discussing the movie HomeAlone.
Did you watch the movie?
I did.  Home alone is the story of a little boy left behind by his family when they fly to Paris on their Christmas Vacation.

Oh! 
 Who played the little boy role?
Macaulay Culkin played the role of Kevin.
Ok, Do you like the movie? And how he acted?
The movie got a CinemaScore of A.  The movie has a lot of slapstick humor which got a lot of praise.
Kevin loves being home alone at first then 2 burglars show up and he has to defend his home.
That's where the slapstick humor comes in.
Ok, Who was your favorite character in the movie? Why?
Kevin is one of my favorite.  I can relate to the fact that he is the youngest and always blamed for everything.  He wishes his family would disappear.
What part of the story told by the movie was the most powerful?
The moment when Kevin wakes up and realizes his family was gone and he was accidentally left behind.
Did any of the characters in this movie make you angry?

Kevin's brother Buzz is constantly ridiculing Kevin. Kevin gets in the fight with him and that's how he ends up in trouble.  It's also a big annoying that his parents actually managed to leave him there alone.
Did you come to respect any of the characters in this movie? Who was it and why did you come to respect that character?
His mother was terrified when she realized he was gone.  She did everything she could to make it back to him with plenty of missteps along the way, but you could really see her love for him and fear.
What did you like best about the movie?
One funny thing was that his mom traveled with a traveling polka band on their moving van to get back to Kevin.
Would you watch it again?
I would.  I love John Hughes movies.  He wrote and produced this movie.
How popular is this film? because I never heard this movie...
Pretty popular.  You may be more familiar with how Kevin handles the burglars.  He sets up a bunch of booby raps around the house to keep them out.
The burglars are played by Daniel Stern and Joe PEsci.
No, I don't know Kevin.. Who is the director? Is him?
The director is Chris Columbus.  The little boy is Kevin.  He set up all kinds of crazy booby traps around his house to keep the burglars out until the police arrive and arrest them.
When was the film made?
The film was made in 1990.
Does this movie have part2?
I believe it does.  The movie ends with his family returning from Paris and KEvin sees his neighbor Marley reuniting with his son  and family for Christmas.

uid2response.feedback: It was a little difficult to respond to the other users questions using only the part of the document I was given.
